PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-11782019-08-07,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB, 
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Energy Board - The Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder approving the ENTRY by the National Energy Board into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada in respect of its employees represented by the Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada, for the period beginning on November 1, 2018 and ending on October 31, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
